bug.author: landiaokafeiyan
bug.summary: the GUI will exit when i slide the mouse pulley.
bug.description: i can install labelme on windows and ubuntu sucessfully. the problem is that when i use labeme to label the image,It will exit the GUI when i slide the mouse pulley

comments.comment: when merge two pionts the program will exit too. in this case, could you show a warning or some otherthings rather than exit the program?

when merge two pionts the program will exit too. in this case,
labelme does not feature of merging points, I think. How did you do this?

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/landiaokafeiyan>@landiaokafeiyan</denchmark-link> can you check which version sub version of qt you are using? If you are using pyqt4 then never mind but if you are using pyqt5=<5.6 then ev.inverted() in the weehlEvent fucntion will throw an Attribute error. Since inverted() is introduced in 5.7
The problem is now fixed. labelme==2.6.3.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/wkentaro>@wkentaro</denchmark-link> thanks very much! so how can I upload the new version? as I installed lablme based on anaconda, should I reinstall anaconda and install labelme againÔºü

you can run
pip install -U labelme

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/wkentaro>@wkentaro</denchmark-link>
HI wkentaro, I used pip install -U labelme to update labelme, and there have some more issues:
maybe little error, about '' activate labelme'' the step 2 based on Anaconda, when install actually should use 'activate lablme' which loss 'e'.
pip install -U labelme have new problems:
Rolling back uninstall of scikit-image Command "D:\ProgramData\Anaconda2\python.exe -u -c "import setuptools, tokenize;file='c:\users\lilia\appdata\local\temp\pip-build-jsy53g\scikit-image\setup.py';f=getattr(tokenize, 'open', open)(file);code=f.read().replace('\r\n', '\n');f.close();exec(compile(code, file, 'exec'))" install --record c:\users\lilia\appdata\local\temp\pip-izcvne-record\install-record.txt --single-version-externally-managed --compile" failed with error code 1 in c:\users\lilia\appdata\local\temp\pip-build-jsy53g\scikit-image\ i suppose it must be something wrong when install scikit-image, but after i install scikit-image successfully, the same issue occurs, do you have some ideas about this issue?
If you're sure that all dependencies are already resolved, you can run pip install -U labelme --no-deps.
Or pip uninstall labelme && pip install labelme.
I USE pip uninstall labelme && pip install labelme Ôºå and installed successfully both on windows and ubuntu. The tool is particularly useful and friendly. thanks for all your help!
